description: Delete a service type unit of measure quantity.
permissions: User must be an admin or have update permission on the quantified resource (Pundit policy for the quantifies record), and the quantity must be user_can_mutate.
side_effects: Deletes the service type unit of measure quantity record.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --confirm is required. Deletion is only allowed when the quantified resource permits it.
